(UNITURN mérőállomás doboz fedlap)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap.txt -t)
(plot cmd: -i uniturn_doboz_fedlap.txt -t -p)
(szerszám beállítás)

t1 m d1.5 h19
t2 m d3 h19

safe0,0,3

yxz

(nagyolás)

t2
s50
f200

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7
ma = 12.05

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

hx = 63
hy = 30

c2 = 0.2
z2 = 5
print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2 ng
h $hx,$hy d3 z$z2 c$c2

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

my = add($my,$ma)
hy = add($hy,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 ng
h $hx,$hy d3

h 45,18 d3


(simítás)

t1

f300

my = 26.3
mx = 35.7

print "mx: $mx"
print "my: $my"
print "ma: $ma"

c2 = 0.1
z2 = 4

print "c2=$c2"
print "z2=$z2"

b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 z$z2 c$c2  ng jg0.4

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng

my = add($my,$ma)
b inline $mx,$my size12.5,5.1 jg0.4 ng
